review: Love it! Very easy to set up and use.
author: Taletha Adkins

review: love it!  The only thing about it that frustrates me is that it is super easy to switch from my ATT uverse dvr programs but when I want to go from the fire stick format back to my dvr selections I can't figure out a way to do it..... that has been very frustrating for me, but then again I am definitely not technically savvy.  That's my only complaint.  Otherwise it is WONDERFUL!
author: Cynthia Garrison "bunnybaby"

review: Did everything the Apple TV did except sync with Iphone and Ipad. Premium movies as good as Netflix but not as many  A great buy for the price
author: leonard axelrod

review: Love it!  Got rid of cable and use the fire TV stick now!
author: Keri

review: Pretty neat device, not the awesomest thing ever, just another way to organize TV apps.
author: Michael P Miarecki

review: Easy to set up and use and at a fair price.
author: MikeyB

review: What a great product.  We plugged it in and it worked beautifully. I would recommend this product to anyone. The picture quality of the movies was fantastic.
author: anyone

review: I love the fire stick! I have 4 tvs in my household, with only 1 being a smart tv and 1 being connected to a smart blue ray player. This comes in handy for my kids tv's if they want to watch some amazon prime items. Works great. Love that I can take this with me when I am traveling.
author: Michelle Smith

review: Works as expected.....great!  Recommended for your video entertainment.  Set-up is easy, use is easy!  May need to buy another.
author: Tom H.
